instructions.title: How to use String Case Converter

steps.title: Enter your text
steps.description: Type or paste any text in the input field. The tool automatically detects the current case format (camelCase, snake_case, etc.).

steps.title: View all conversions
steps.description: All case conversions are displayed instantly. See your text in camelCase, PascalCase, snake_case, kebab-case, CONSTANT_CASE, and more.

steps.title: Copy the format you need
steps.description: Hover over any conversion and click the copy button to copy that specific format to your clipboard.

steps.title: Use batch mode for multiple strings
steps.description: Switch to Batch Mode to convert multiple strings at once. Enter one string per line, select the target case, and convert all at once.

steps.title: Try the examples
steps.description: Click on any quick example to see how different input formats are converted to all case types.
